title: Pearls of Aphrodite
description: Mythology, masquerade balls, creepy creatures, exotic missions, demigods, epic love and a little good old fashioned high school bullying collide in New Orleans, Louisiana as sixteen-year-old Avinia Dolce embarks on a quest to save her family and for true immortality, or suffer eternity in Tarturus.
author: J.C. Quills
